sentences.en: a cruise ship featuring extensive spa facilities
sentences.cn: 以大量水疗设施为特色的邮轮

sentences.en: a feature on holidaying with your dog
sentences.cn: 一档带上狗去度假的专题节目

sentences.en: A short documentary prefaced the feature movie.
sentences.cn: 故事片开始前放映了一部短纪录片.

sentences.en: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.cn: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.en: He had fine delicate features.
sentences.cn: 他眉清目秀。

sentences.en: Her eyes are her best feature.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛是她容貌最美的一部分.

sentences.en: Her eyes were her best feature, wide-set and compelling.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛是她五官中长得最好的，大而迷人。

sentences.en: In 1933 the studio cranked out fifty-five feature films.
sentences.cn: 1993年，该电影公司粗制滥造出了55部故事片。

sentences.en: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.cn: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.en: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.cn: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.en: Perhaps the most unusual feature in the room is an extraordinary pair of candles.
sentences.cn: 也许，这间屋子最与众不同之处就是一对非同寻常的蜡烛。

sentences.en: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.cn: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.en: Such problems are a universal feature of old age.
sentences.cn: 这类问题是老年人的通病。

sentences.en: Television companies tend to censor bad language in feature films.
sentences.cn: 电视公司往往会在审查故事片时删去其中的粗话。

sentences.en: The exhibition features paintings by Picasso.
sentences.cn: 这次展览重点展出毕加索的画作。

sentences.en: The festival will feature pyrotechnics, live music, and sculptures.
sentences.cn: 节日里将有烟花表演、现场音乐会和雕塑展。

sentences.en: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.en: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.cn: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

sentences.en: The island's chief feature was its beauty.
sentences.cn: 这个岛的主要特色是风景秀丽.

sentences.en: The magazine makes a feature of children's stories.
sentences.cn: 该杂志以刊登儿童故事为特色.

sentences.en: The most arresting feature is the painted wall decoration.
sentences.cn: 最醒目的特点是绘有图画的墙面装饰。

sentences.en: The predominant feature of his character was pride.
sentences.cn: 他的性格中主要的特点是骄傲.

sentences.en: The saddles feature a reflective trim for night time visibility.
sentences.cn: 这些车座的特点是带有在夜间可视的反光镶边。

sentences.en: Windmills are a characteristic feature of the Mallorcan landscape.
sentences.cn: 风车是马略卡岛风光的一大特色。

sentences.en: Your feature has the merit of simply stating what has been achieved.
sentences.cn: 你这篇专题文章的可取之处是简明扼要地道出了取得的成就。

words.tran_cn: 特定的；被作为特色的；有…的面貌特征的
非常轻的人或物；不重要的人；轻量级选手
使…有特色；起重要作用（feature的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 设计特点；结构特点；设计数据；设计形体
主要特征；主要特点；主景；功能特点
语义特征；语意特征；语义要素
专用功能部件；特别策划；特别收录
地貌；地表特征；场地地貌

trans.tran_cn: 特征，五官，特写，正片，故事片
trans.tran_en: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical

trans.tran_cn: 脸一部分，面貌，特征，特写，故事片
trans.tran_en: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical

trans.tran_cn: 以…为特征，由…主演，以…为主要内容，占重要地位
trans.tran_en: to include or show something as a special or important part of something, or to be included as an important part
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it
